{{Infobox Film | name = You and Me | image = YouAndMePoster.jpg | image_size = | caption = | director = [[Fritz Lang]] | producer = | writer = [[Norman Krasna]]
[[Virginia van Upp]] | narrator = | starring = [[Sylvia Sidney]]
[[George Raft]] | music = [[Kurt Weill]] | cinematography = | editing = | distributor = | released = [[1938 in film|1938]] | runtime = | country = United States | language = | budget = | preceded_by = | followed_by = }} '''''You and Me''''' is a [[1938 in film|1938]] film by [[Fritz Lang]]. [[Sylvia Sidney]] and [[George Raft]] play a pair of criminals on parole and working in a department store full of similar cases; [[Harry Carey (actor born 1878)|Harry Carey]]'s character routinely hires ex-convicts to staff his store. The movie was written by [[Norman Krasna]] and [[Virginia van Upp]], and directed by [[Fritz Lang]]. ==Cast== *[[Sylvia Sidney]] as Helen Dennis *[[George Raft]] as Joe Dennis *[[Barton MacLane]] as Mickey Bain *[[Harry Carey (actor born 1878)|Harry Carey]] as Jerome Morris *[[Robert Cummings]] as Jim *[[Guinn "Big Boy" Williams]] as Taxi *[[Ellen Drew]] as a cashier (uncredited) == External links == * {{Amg movie|117952|You and Me}} * {{imdb title|id=0030996|title=You and Me}} {{Fritz Lang}} [[Category:1938 films]] [[Category:American films]] [[Category:Black-and-white films]] [[Category:English-language films]] [[Category:Films directed by Fritz Lang]] [[Category:Paramount Pictures films]] [[Category:1930s musical films]] {{musical-film-stub}} [[ca:You and Me]] [[es:You and Me (pelÃ­cula)]] [[eu:You and Me]] [[fr:Casier judiciaire (film)]] [[fi:Ehdonalaisesti vapauteen]] [[pt:You and Me]]
